show_name: Air Gear: Kuro no Hane to Nemuri no Mori -Break on the Sky- (OAV)
other_title: エア・ギア 黒の羽と眠りの森 -Break on the Sky- (Japanese)
plot: First episode is based on the 16th volume of the manga. Features Ikki vs. Ringo. Second and third episode is based on the 23th/24th volume of the manga. Features Kogarasumaru vs. Ex-Sleeping Forest inside Inorganic Net.
ending_theme: "Forest walker" by a flood of circle
